price:
45. Ugu soo qaad tusaale nolosha  
adduunkan inay la mid tahay biyaha aan ka soo dejinno daruuraha, markaa dhirta ka soo baxda dhulka noqoto mid isku darsanta, haddana noqota xaabo engeg ah u burburta gaballo ay dabeyshu firdhiso,  Allena wuxuu ku leeyahay awood wax walba dushood.
arabic: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَصۡبَحَ هَشِيمٗا تَذۡرُوهُ ٱلرِّيَٰحُۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّقۡتَدِرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathala al-ḥayati al-dun'yā kamāin anzalnāhu mina al-samāi fa-ikh'talaṭa bihi nabātu al-arḍi fa-aṣbaḥa hashīman tadhrūhu al-riyāḥu wakāna al-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin muq'tadiran
